description_html: The aluminum-framed Trig Armchair, named for the relationships of angles, lengths, and triangles explored in trigonometry, is available in four finish combinations offering a broad range of looks from subtle, earthy tones to zippy, seaside blue and white. Suitable for outdoor or indoor use, the seat and back of every piece are made from a strong yet soft mesh fabric sling. The armchairs stack in threes for easy storage in tight spaces.
